title: Anko
content: Extension to kotlin to remove boilerplate code for calling a new activity, start an async task, etc

title: Otto
content: Library to write and read from the data bus of an application. Currently deprecated for RxJava/ RxAndroid

title: DataBinding
content: Part of the architecture components. Declaratively bind observable data to UI elements

title: LifeCycle Aware
content: Part of the architecture components. Manage your activity and fragment lifecycles

title: Live Data
content: Part of the architecture components. Notify views when underlying database changes

title: Navigation
content: Part of the architecture components. Handle everything needed for in-app navigation

title: Paging
content: Part of the architecture components. Gradually load information on demand from your data source

title: Room (persistence)
content:
Part of the architecture components. Fluent SQLite database access

It avoids the boilerplate code to interact with SQLIte

Room requires Entities, Data Access Objects and Repositories

title: ViewModel
content: Part of the architecture components. Manage UI-related data in a lifecycle-conscious way

title: Work Manager
content: Part of the architecture components. Manage your Android background jobs

title: Realm
content: Database alternative to SQLite and Core data based on persistence of objects

title: Butter Knife
content: Annotate fields with @BindView and a view ID for Butter Knife to find and automatically cast the corresponding view in your layout.

title: Dagger 2
content: Dagger is a fully static, compile-time dependency injection framework for both Java and Android

title: Retrofit
content: REST client for Android that allows to make GET, POST, PUT, PATCH, DELETE and HEAD calls. It uses java POJO's to make the conversion between the API response and it uses a callback class to handle the response

title: OkHttp
content: REST client for Android that allows to make GET, POST calls. There's no direct support for POJO's as in Retrofit. The user has to implement all the conversion from the raw response

title: Glide
content: Library to set images (via URL, Drawable objects or assets directory) into Image View elements. It also includes some image modifiers to show round, cropped, squared, round shapes, etc

title: Universal Image Loader
content: Library to set images (via URL, Drawable objects or assets directory) into Image View elements. It also includes some image modifiers to show round, cropped, squared, round shapes, etc
